body: At 3rd level, and every three levels thereafter, an antipaladin can select one cruelty. Each cruelty adds an effect to the antipaladin's touch of corruption ability. Whenever the antipaladin uses touch of corruption to deal damage to one target, the target also receives the additional effect from one of the cruelties possessed by the antipaladin. This choice is made when the touch is used. The target receives a Fortitude save to avoid this cruelty. If the save is successful, the target takes the damage as normal, but not the effects of the cruelty. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 the antipaladin's level + the antipaladin's Charisma modifier. At 3rd level, the antipaladin can select from the following initial cruelties.
name: Cruelty

sections.name: • Fatigued
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Paladin/Antipaladin/Class Features/Cruelty/• Fatigued

sections.body: The target is shaken for 1 round per level of the antipaladin.
sections.name: • Shaken
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Paladin/Antipaladin/Class Features/Cruelty/• Shaken

sections.body:
The target is sickened for 1 round per level of the antipaladin.

At 6th level, an antipaladin adds the following cruelties to the list of those that can be selected.
sections.name: • Sickened
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Paladin/Antipaladin/Class Features/Cruelty/• Sickened

sections.body: The target is dazed for 1 round.
sections.name: • Dazed
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Paladin/Antipaladin/Class Features/Cruelty/• Dazed

sections.body: The target contracts a disease, as if the antipaladin had cast contagion, using his antipaladin level as his caster level.
sections.name: • Diseased
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Paladin/Antipaladin/Class Features/Cruelty/• Diseased

sections.body:
The target is staggered for 1 round per two levels of the antipaladin.

At 9th level, an antipaladin adds the following cruelties to the list of those that can be selected.
sections.name: • Staggered
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Paladin/Antipaladin/Class Features/Cruelty/• Staggered

sections.body: The target is cursed, as if the antipaladin had cast bestow curse, using his antipaladin level as his caster level.
sections.name: • Cursed
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Paladin/Antipaladin/Class Features/Cruelty/• Cursed

sections.body: The target is exhausted. The antipaladin must have the fatigue cruelty before selecting this cruelty.
sections.name: • Exhausted
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Paladin/Antipaladin/Class Features/Cruelty/• Exhausted

sections.body: The target is frightened for 1 round per two levels of the antipaladin. The antipaladin must have the shaken cruelty before selecting this cruelty.
sections.name: • Frightened
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Paladin/Antipaladin/Class Features/Cruelty/• Frightened

sections.body: The target is nauseated for 1 round per three levels of the antipaladin. The antipaladin must have the sickened cruelty before selecting this cruelty.
sections.name: • Nauseated
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Paladin/Antipaladin/Class Features/Cruelty/• Nauseated

sections.body:
The target is poisoned, as if the antipaladin had cast poison, using the antipaladin's level as the caster level.

At 12th level, an antipaladin adds the following cruelties to the list of those that can be selected.
sections.name: • Poisoned
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Paladin/Antipaladin/Class Features/Cruelty/• Poisoned

sections.body: The target is blinded for 1 round per level of the antipaladin.
sections.name: • Blinded
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Paladin/Antipaladin/Class Features/Cruelty/• Blinded

sections.body: The target is deafened for 1 round per level of the antipaladin.
sections.name: • Deafened
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Paladin/Antipaladin/Class Features/Cruelty/• Deafened

sections.body: The target is paralyzed for 1 round.
sections.name: • Paralyzed
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Paladin/Antipaladin/Class Features/Cruelty/• Paralyzed

sections.body:
The target is stunned for 1 round per four levels of the antipaladin.

These abilities are not cumulative. For example, a 12th-level antipaladin's touch of corruption ability deals 6d6 points of damage and might also cause the target to become fatigued, dazed, poisoned, or diseased. Once a cruelty is chosen, it can't be changed.
